name: phoenixDSK
description: A Blackboard Learn REST Application Modeled after the YorkDSK B2. Built on Elixir/Phoenix.

env.APP_KEY: Replace this with your REST app key.
env.APP_SECRET: Replace this with your REST app Secret.
env.LEARNSERVER: Replace this with the FQDN of your Learn server.
env.PHOENIX_DSK_USER: Replace this with the username for login.
env.PHOENIX_DSK_PWD: Replace this with the password for login.
